import Link from 'next/link' import Head from 'next/head' import ExtLink from './ext-link' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' const navItems: { label: string; page?: string; link?: string }[] = [ { label: 'Journal', page: '/blog' }, { label: 'About', page: '/' } ] const ogImageUrl = 'https://notion-blog.now.sh/og-image.png' export default ({ title = '', children = null }) => { const { pathname } = useRouter() return <> {title || 'Jamees'}
{children}
{children ?
Back
: navItems.map(({ label, page, link }) => (
{page ? ( {label} ) : ( {label} )}
))}
}
